about_experience: Primarily, my expertise lies in JavaScript and TypeScript development within the Node.js environment. I am proficient in leveraging Docker for the creation, deployment, and execution of applications encapsulated within containers. Additionally, I am adept at using Git for version control. My technical skills encompass a wide range of technologies and frameworks, including HTML, CSS, JS, TS, SCSS, Pug, Bootstrap 5, Vue, Nuxt, and Express.
